About the Package ================================ Apache Kafka is a community distributed streaming platform capable of handling trillions of events a day. Initially conceived as a messaging queue, Kafka is based on an abstraction of a distributed commit log. Since being created, Kafka has quickly evolved from messaging queue to a full-fledged streaming platform.
=Supported versions= v2.1.0
=Setup= * Java verion 7 or above should be installed on Agent OS. * Internet Connection should be available on Agent OS.
=Common Inputs= - Broker Address*: Provide Broker Server address including port. Multiple brokers can be provided as separated by comma. - SSL*: Specify whether SSL is enabled on the kafka server. - SSL Truststore Location: Provide location of the SSL Truststore. E.g.: /bin/client.trustore.jks - SSL Truststore Password : PProvide password for given truststore. - SSL Keystore Location : Provide location of the SSL Keystore. E.g.: /var/private/ss/kafka.client.keystore.jks - SSL Keystore Password : Provide password for given keystore. - SSL Password : Provide SSL password.
=Actions= Following actions are supported
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_KAFKA.PUB.ACTION.SEND_MESSAGE * Action Description: This action sends a message to the Kafka broker.
